channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Obstructed view to oncoming traffic, 21st May
item.description:
On Kidnappers Lane adjacent to the Vineries and extending towards The Moat. Road Narrowing allowing only one car to pass. With signs each end to indicate who has priority
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Multiple potholes and sinkage where the road has previously been dug up and resurfaced, 21st May
item.description:
Outside number 5-7 Victoria Place

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Victoria Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 21st May
item.description:
Customer states that the lights are out of sync and are causing unnecessary delays.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Multiple potholes on Victoria Place, 21st May
item.description:
Right in the junction with Fairview Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Victoria Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 21st May
item.description:
Email received 21/05/2024 - copy attached. Customer reports that a Lime Tree at the location is covered in Ivy, which is encroaching on the path. They have requested that this receives some attention.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 21st May
item.description:
NWD with give an take footway pothole 900x400x50mm tarmac patch required (FW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing audible sound too loud/soft problem, 21st May
item.description:
The Button on side of column 1 and 2 the buttons do not work at all so people are crossing with out the lights changing gas they are unable to get them to change
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 21st May
item.description:
28 day with 2 way stop and go please replace x1 broken broadbox frame an cover 400x550mm (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 21st May
item.description:
28 day with 15 minutes delay boards carriageway pothole 500x600x50mm (CW10 Pothole)

item.title: Over Flowing Bin, 21st May
item.description:
General waste bins get collected on a Monday in Bishops Cleeve and this one has been missed. Photos, wells and moving are wht 3 words.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
